name: Sweet Sins: Kawaii Run
summary:
Don’t be fooled by the utterly kawaii art style, Sweet Sins is an endless runner like you have never seen: it’s fast, it’s challenging, it’s evil and yup, it’s also extremely cute. If you’re looking for an old school arcade challenge, your search ends right here.
Sweet Sins is an original infinite runner where you lead Luna, Sandy, Rica, Nana, Red, Ivy and Moira on their journey! Very easy to play but hard to master!
